name: Generate Video from Image
objective: Animate still images into short video clips using AI-powered video generation with Veo
description: A creative workflow for transforming static images into animated video content using Google AI Studio's built-in Veo video generator. Upload an image and describe the desired motion to create engaging video clips without video editing software.
time_saved: Eliminates need for complex video editing software and manual animation (saves 30-120 minutes per video)

tools_required.purpose: AI video generation platform with Veo integration

tasks.description: Open Google AI Studio and access the Generate Media module for Veo video generation
Upload the source image to be animated (from local computer or Google Drive)
Describe desired motion and animation (e.g., 'make the dog stand up and walk away', 'zoom into the building')
Adjust aspect ratio, duration, frame rate, and add negative prompts if needed
Run generation, preview output, and download MP4 file

objects_created.description: Short MP4 video with AI-generated motion from still image

entry_criteria: Static image file available (JPG, PNG, etc.)
Understanding of aspect ratio requirements for target platform
exit_criteria: MP4 file downloaded and ready for use
use_cases: Animate product photos for social media
Create dynamic thumbnails from static images
Add motion to historical or archival photos
Prototype video concepts before full production
best_practices: Use high-quality source images for best results
Be specific in motion descriptions (direction, speed, type of movement)
Start with simple animations before complex multi-object movements
Generate multiple variants to compare results
Use negative prompts to avoid unwanted artifacts
Match aspect ratio to target platform (vertical for Stories, horizontal for YouTube)
Review video quality before using in production
Keep animations natural and realistic for professional content
common_pitfalls: Using low-resolution source images resulting in pixelated video
Vague motion descriptions leading to unpredictable results
Not specifying aspect ratio, getting wrong format for platform
Expecting complex multi-step animations in single generation
Not using negative prompts to filter out unwanted elements
Insufficient processing time allowance (Veo generation takes 1-3 minutes)
integration_with_other_workflows: WRF-021: Generated videos can be used with social media captions
Image editing workflows (prepare images before animation)
